title: Music and SFX Volume
body:
In the live client, there are options to alter the music volume and SFX volume independently. However, this feature is absent in the alpha client.

Personally, I used this feature a lot, and hope for its return in the new client. I understand that it won't be a top priority, but it would be a nice quality of life update sometime in the future.

replies.body: We now have a ticket for this. Thanks for testing the alpha!
